casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kurt Allen COREY 189P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 22, 2018 Mr. Franklin E. Wells, Jr., Asheboro, Attorney at Law, for Corey, Kurt Allen Ms. Sharon Patrick-Wilson, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina Mr. Kurt Allen Corey, for Corey, Kurt Allen Ms. Amy Kunstling Irene, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina

Mr. David Learner, District Attorney, for State *460The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of June 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of June 2018."
